about_the_game:
MechaKnights

As the pilot of massive mechanical armor, embark on a hunt for dragons and other fantasy creatures!

Game Features:

  • Harsh Battles and Challenges: Face powerful dragons and dangerous creatures dwelling in the darkest corners of the world. Only true skill will allow you to overcome these dangers and survive.

  • Customize Your Mecha: Modify the appearance, weaponry, and abilities of your mecha to create a unique knight. Master the art of tactical combat using heavy weapons, enchanted armor, and destructive magic.

  • Explore Vast Locations: From dense forests to ancient ruins, discover numerous unique creatures and environments.

content_descriptors.notes: graphic creature killing and villages destroyed, blood and violence.

  • OS: Windows 10 （64-bit）
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4130 or Core™ i5-3470 or AMD FX™-6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 1030 (DDR4) or AMD Radeon™ RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 12
